title: Test
yAxis: Number of internet users in millions
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Number of internet users in millions, with a total of 7 data points.
Overall Number of internet users in millions has increased over the Year.
Number of internet users in millions is slightly increasing from 2017 to 2018, and lastly roughly constant from 2018 to 2023.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2017 and 2018.
Max Number of internet users in millions about 117.9 was recorded at Year 2019,  2020, and 2021
Min Number of internet users in millions about 115.8 was recorded at Year 2017
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Number of internet users in millions, with a total of 7 data points. The chart has 3 significant trends.
The longest trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 2021 to 2023.
But, the next significant trend is slightly constant which exists from 2019 to 2021.
But, the next significant trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2017 to 2019.
